title: Example: Value Iteration
formulas: V_k+1(s) <- max { sum T(s, a, s') [R(s, a, s') + Î³V_k(s')] }
summary: The slide presents an example of Value Iteration in AI, showing the iterative process of updating value functions V0, V1, and V2. It includes a diagram illustrating the transition of states with associated rewards and discount factors, and a formula for calculating the next value function.
